info.title: Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
info.description:
A request from the account holder party to the bank to cancel a current account contract or a savings account contract immediately or at a future time. 
You can cancel a bank account contract, reverse the cancellation of a bank account contract, or calculate the financial results of a bank account contract cancellation.
You can use this API to create, query, read, update, or delete cancel requests.

Comment:
A Current Account Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account of type current account and consists among others, account holder, general terms and conditions. A Savings Account Contract is a contract between a financial institution and a customer, which is based on the customer's request to open a bank account of type savings account. A savings account is a depository account offered by a financial institution that provides principal security and a modest interest rate. Withdrawals from savings accounts can be subject to notice, and are usually not allowed by using checks or debit cards.

Remark:
The service Bank Account Contract Cancel Request is assigned to service group Transactional Banking. General: The properties of the EDM that are based on a code GDT do not contain supplementary components (e.g. listID) that are known from the GDTs of the enterprise services.

x-sap-shortText: Manage requests to cancel bank account contracts using this synchronous inbound service

get.summary: Query Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
get.description: Is a request to query bank account contract payment cancel requests

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description:
Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionfilter)

Required filter properties:
- BankAccountContractUUID

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

post.summary: Create Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
post.description: Is a request to create a bank account contract payment cancel request

parameters.name: UUID
parameters.description:
A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract cancel request.  
GDT: NOSC_UUID

get.summary: Read Bank Account Contract Cancel Request by UUID
get.description: Is a request to read a bank account contract payment cancel request

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_SystemQueryOptionselect)

patch.summary: Update Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
patch.description: Is a request to update a bank account contract payment cancel request

delete.summary: Cancel Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
delete.description: Is a request to cancel a bank account contract payment cancel request

post.summary: Calculate by Bank Account Contract UUID.
post.description: Calculates a bank account contract cancel request by bank account contract UUID in case no cancel request exists.

BankAccountContractUUID.title: A BankAccountContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.

ReasonCode.title: A coded representation of the reason for the BankAccountContractCancelRequest.

ReceiptDate.title: A ReceiptDate is the date on which the request for canceling the bank account contract is received .

PlannedCompletionDate.title: A PlannedCompletionDate is the date for which the completion of the bank account contract cancel request is planned.

BankAccountSettlementRequiredIndicator.title: Indicates whether a bank account settlement is required for a bank account contract cancel request or not.

BankAccountSettlementRequestedValueDate.title: Is the value date requested for settlement of the bank account associated with the cancelled bank account contract.
BankAccountSettlementRequestedValueDate.description:
Integrity Condition: Only specified if LifeCycleStatus is "Completed".
GDT: Date

schema.title: Bank Account Contract Cancel Request
schema.description: A Bank Account Contract Cancel Request is a request from the account holder party to the bank to cancel a current account contract or a savings account contract immediately or at a future time.

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET BankAccountContractCancelRequests HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

FinancialConditionTypeCode.title: A coded representation of the type of a financial condition for bank contracts.

BkAccountCurrencyPostedAmount.title: A BankAccountCurrencyPostedAmount is the amount  that is posted for the settlement item in bank account currency.

com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.title: Bank Account Settlement Summary
com.sap.gateway.default.bankaccountcontr.description: Summary of the results for the settlement performed during completion of the cancel request. Integrity Condition: BankAccountSettlementSummary is only returned, if LifeCycleStatusCode equals "3 - Active" or "5 - Completed". The settlement summary is simulated for a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "3 - Active". For a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "5 - Executed", the settlement summary is read from the data base.

The settlement summary is simulated for a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "3 - Active". For a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "5 - Executed", the settlement summary is read from the data base.

UUID.title: A UUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract cancel request.

ID.title: ID is an identifier of the Bank Account Contract Cancel Request.

BankAccountContractUUID.title: A BankAccountContractUUID is an universal unique identifier of a bank account contract.
BankAccountContractUUID.description:
Bank Account Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account and consists among others, the bank account type, account holder, general terms and conditions.
GDT: NOSC_UUID

ChangeStateID.title: A ChangeStateID is a unique identifier for a change state.
ChangeStateID.description:
Bank Account Contract is a contract between a credit institute and customer, which is based on the customer's request for opening a bank account and consists among others, the bank account type, account holder, general terms and conditions.
GDT: ChangeStateID

LifeCycleStatusCode.title: A LifeCycleStatusCode is the coded representation of the life cycle status of a BankAccountContractCancelRequest.

LifeCycleStatusName.title: A LifeCycleStatusName is the name of a LifeCycleStatusCode.

ReasonCode.title: A coded representation of the reason for the BankAccountContractCancelRequest.

ReasonName.title: ReasonName is the name of a ReasonCode.

ImmediateCompletionRequiredIndicator.title: Indicates whether immediate completion of the bank account contract cancel request is required or not.

ReceiptDate.title: A ReceiptDate is the date on which the request for canceling the bank account contract is received.

PlannedCompletionDate.title: A PlannedCompletionDate is the date for which the completion of the bank account contract cancel request is planned.

CompletionDate.title: A CompletionDate is the date on which the request for canceling the bank account contract is completed.
CompletionDate.description:
Integrity Condition: CompletionDate is only specified if LifeCycleStatusCode is "6 - Completed".
GDT: Date

BankAccountSettlementRequiredIndicator.title: Indicates whether a bank account settlement is required for a bank account contract cancel request or not.

BankAccountSettlementRequestedValueDate.title: Is the value date requested for settlement of the bank account associated with the cancelled bank account contract.

CancellationReasonCode.title: A coded representation of the reason for the cancelation of a CurrentAccountContractCancelRequest.
CancellationReasonCode.description:
Integrity Condition: CancellationReasonCode is only specified if LifeCycleStatusCode is "4 - Deactivated" or "6 - Canceled".
Note: Corresponds either to Deactivation Reason or to Reactivation Reason
GDT: BankAccountContractCancelRequestCancellationReasonCode

CancellationReasonName.title: A BankAccountContractCancelRequestCancellationReasonName is the name of a BankAccountContractCancelRequestCancellationReasonCode.

BankAccountSettlementCancellationRequire.title: Indicates whether or not a cancelation of a bank account settlement is required for the cancelation of a bank account contract cancel request.
BankAccountSettlementCancellationRequire.description:
Integrity Condition: BankAccountSettlementCancellationRequiredIndicator is only specified if LifeCycleStatusCode is "6 - Canceled".
GDT: Indicator

CancellationDate.title: A CancellationDate is the date on which the request for canceling the current account contract is cancelled.
CancellationDate.description:
Integrity Condition: CancellationDate is only specified if LifeCycleStatusCode is "4 - Deactivated" or "6 - Canceled".
GDT: Date

ResidualBankAccountBalanceAmount.title: The residual balance of the bank account, before it is balanced by cash or by payment to payment transaction instruction.
ResidualBankAccountBalanceAmount.description:
Integrity Condition: ResidualBankAccountBalanceAmount is only returned, if LifeCycleStatusCode equals "3 - Active" or "5 - Completed". The amount is simulated for a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "3 - Active". For a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "5 - Executed", the amount is read from the data base. 
GDT: Amount

CancellationChargeAmount.title: The charge amount for cancelation of the bank account contract.
CancellationChargeAmount.description:
Remark: The charge amount that is levied if the bank account contract cancel request is completed. The completion of the cancel request cancels the bank account contract. Integrity Condition: CancellationChargeAmount is only returned, if LifeCycleStatusCode equals "3 - Active" or "5 - Completed". The amount is simulated for a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "3 - Active". For a BankAccountContractCancelRequest with LifeCycleStatusCode "5 - Executed", the amount is read from the data base. 
GDT: Amount

BusinessProcessChainAssignment.title: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.
BusinessProcessChainAssignment.description:
Defaults: If BankingBusinessTransactionTypeCode is not specfiied, code value "100002 - Current Account Contract Termination" or "400002 - Deposit Account Contract Termination" will be used by default.
BOCT: BusProcChnAssgmtFSElmnts

BalancingByCashIndicator.title: Indicates whether amount resulting from balancing the bank account associated with bank account contract cancellation is requested as payment by cash or not.
BalancingByCashIndicator.description:
Integrity Condition: Either BalancingPaymentByCashRequestedIndicator or BalancingPaymentTransactionInstruction must be specified.
GDT: Indicator

BalancingPaymentTransactionInstruction.title: BalancingPaymentTransactionInstruction specifies the payment transaction instruction for balancing the residual balance of the bank account associated with the bank account contract.
BalancingPaymentTransactionInstruction.description:
Integrity Condition: Either BalancingPaymentByCashRequestedIndicator or BalancingPaymentTransactionInstruction must be specified.
BkContrPaytTransacInstrnFSElmnts

ClassCode.title: A coded representation of a class of a bank contract payment transaction instruction.
ClassCode.description:
Code Values are: 1 (Internal Payment), 2 (Domestic Payment), 3 (SEPA Payment).
Integrity Condition: I case of 1 (Internal Payment) BankAccountID, BankRoutingID and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.
In case of 2 (Domestic Payment) HolderName, BankAccountID, BankRoutingID, and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.
In case of 3 (SEPA Payment) HolderName, BankAccountStandardID and BankStandardID of CounterpartyBankAccount and DirectDebitMandateID and CreditorID of DirectDebitMandate have to be filled.
BDT: BankContractPaymentTransactionInstructionClassCode

CounterpartyBankAccount.title: Contains the bank account for which residual account balance has to be credited or cancellation charge amount to be debited.

DirectDebitMandate.title: The direct debit mandate used in a payment transaction instruction.

ClassCode.title: A coded representation of a class of a bank contract payment transaction instruction.
ClassCode.description:
Code Values are: 1 (Internal Payment), 2 (Domestic Payment), 3 (SEPA Payment).
Integrity Condition: I case of 1 (Internal Payment) BankAccountID, BankRoutingID and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.
In case of 2 (Domestic Payment) HolderName, BankAccountID, BankRoutingID, and CountryCode of CounterpartyBankAccount have to be filled.
In case of 3 (SEPA Payment) HolderName, BankAccountStandardID and BankStandardID of CounterpartyBankAccount and DirectDebitMandateID and CreditorID of DirectDebitMandate have to be filled.

StandardID.title: Bank Identification Code (BIC) of the Society for Worldwide Interbank Financial Telecommunications (S.W.I.F.T.), see GDT BankStandardID.

RoutingID.title: Number of the bank in a clearing system (see GDT BankRoutingID).

CountryCode.title: Country in which the bank identified earlier goes about its business. If the bank is a member in a national clearing system, the country to which this clearing system belongs is entered here. Constraint: Only listID 3166-1 of listAgencyID 5 will be supported.
